跪乳.definition: (literary) (of a lamb) to kneel to suckle at the breast (used as a metaphor for filial piety)

跪倒.definition: to kneel down; to sink to one's knees; to grovel

跪坐.definition: to sit kneeling with legs folded underneath the thighs and buttocks resting on the heels

跪拜.definition: to kowtow; to kneel and worship

跪毯.definition: a prayer mat; a carpet for kneeling
